Comments_List:
I learned and practiced how to deliver an academic conference paper presentation. I had the opportunity to share with the group my paper presented at the Association of American Geographers. I gained skills in public speaking, facilitating Q&A sections, and creating a visual presentation. 

Additionally, I also learned how to write and revise an op-ed. This required developing skills to create academic writing more publicly accessible.
Its the best class! Historiography, methods, grad school processes.
Yes, I have taken this class every semester and I always learn something new. In all, this working group is the reason I feel on-track and prepared to continue thriving in my PhD studies.
Yes, for the opportunity for group discussion and learning beyond home departments and cohorts.
